message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $100.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I am willing to pay $90 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $95.
I'm glad you're willing to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose $92 for the product.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again. I'll offer the product to you for $97. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to considering other buyers.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $95 for the product.
